name: Repossessed - Monthly Mini-Game #1
description:
Axol Studio's 2021 Monthly Mini-game #1

You are a ghost trapped in a dungeon full of monsters! Possess monsters to take control of them and fight other monsters, bypass obstacles, and make your way down to the bottom of the dungeon where treasure awaits!

This game was made in a SINGLE MONTH for Axol Studio's 2021 Monthly Mini-game project! It shows off a chunk of a game's idea and should be seen as more of a proof-of-concept than a 100% realized and polished game experience. 

MODIFIER: Mouth Sounds - All of the sounds in the game were recorded using my own mouth!

If you want to be involved with our 1-game-a-month experiment and join our community, visit us at https://www.patreon.com/axolstudio

When you buy this game, the Source Code is also included.

How to Play:

ActionKeyboardGamepadMovementArrow Keys / WASDDPAD / Analog Stick
Attack (When possessing)CAUnpossess (When possessing)ZBPausePStartReset LevelRBackToggle FullscreenAlt+Enter
